name: places/ChIJp1PdekNZwokRzaD5yJ7eicI
formattedAddress: 234 W 27th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 234 W 27th St, New York, NY 10001-5901, USA

originalText.text: This is without the very best shop in the the city.  The vibe is so relaxed, friendly, warm, personable, you immediately feel very comfortable and know that you are in good hands.  Tim has created and curated this environment for his customers.  I started going to Tim about a year ago, right after a really bad barber had literally chopped my hair in so many layers that it is hard to describe what it looked like, but trust me it was not good.  I found Tim at Public Image and within 7 months he had somehow managed to get my hair back in shape.  I know how he managed, he is an expert when it comes to cutting hair.  He listens, recommends and most importantly follows through and gives you the exact cut that you had discussed with him.  I can't say enough about Tim other than he is just an all around spectacular guy even minus his expertise in cutting hair.  Everyone do yourself a favor and book a haircut with Tim or actually any of the others in his shop!  They are all great.  Public Image NYC is a very solid 10

originalText.text: Great costumer service and the ambiance of the place was spot on. The owner of the shop Tim (also the person who worked on my hair) did an amazing job of communicating with me in regards to what was best for my hair and  my overall expectations. He gave me a consultation upon my arrival and threw in a free hair treatment! The end product was just perfect! I received tons of compliments on my hair the following day as well. I would definitely come back for touch ups and a hair cut. Highly recommend this place!

originalText.text:
Come here. See Will for the best fade you’ll get in the area.  The atmosphere is chill, no frills.

They play good music and the art feels like you’re in on a secret show to your favorite rapper or punk band.

If you’re in the area and need a quick update on your look I would recommend coming here.

originalText.text:
I’ve been going to Tim for years– even after moving across the country, I still make trips to see him because no one does it like him!! He’s a great listener and takes your thoughts into account, but also brings a level of creativity and expertise and always ends up giving me a haircut or color that’s even better than I imagined. He always takes his time to make sure I’m happy with the work, and he’s also just a fun person to spend a few hours chatting with.

The space itself is so comfortable and well designed, down to the candles in the bathroom.

Seriously, this place feels like a hidden gem in NYC and I almost don’t want to write this review, but Tim and the crew at Public Image deserve all the praise and love!

originalText.text: I have been a loyal customer of Liz’s for 3 years and followed her from her previous shop because she is so skilled. She is an incredible barber for both men and women’s short cuts. I brought in a photo for inspiration and she was able to figure out exactly what I was looking for and maintains communication throughout the cut and styling so I get exactly what I want. She also masterfully manages my two very uncooperative cowlicks. I constantly get compliments on my hair and am always so happy with how it looks. I can’t recommend her more highly.
